summary: The true love between a couple in 1910, 1960 and 2012. Their love is so strong that even destiny wants to bring them together.
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra|Prachi Desai|Neha Sharma|Raj Singh Arora|Greg Heffernan|Vrajesh Hirjee|Omar Khan|John Michael Lowe|Surendra Pal|Shankar Sachdev|Atul Sharma|Tarun Sharma
title: Teri Meri Kahaani
